name: Utoy's Chronicle RPG
description:
"A story of a boy name Utoy, who lost his memories. then he wake up in a Island name Abruton Bruton. Utoy join a Guild to find the clue of his lost memories. And now Utoy find his lost memories, Rank Up to make strong and get companions to his lost memories  Adventure."

Game Made in Free Trials of RPG Maker MZ.

Game Created for RTP Game Jam.

All Image and tilesets are default and No plug In.

Features :

- Rank Up your Guild Class

-Travel to different dimension

-Fly with your dragon

-Get Ancient Piece to get Ancient Equipment.

-Find Hidden Treasure after Rank Up class.

-All items is in Rando Box drop by monster.

Note :  In mobile app wait for a minute to load the game.

 - If you cant go to the north part of the town get the Log Book on the Kaye House after kaye said that you need to talk to her mother. It will apear on left room.

- animation skill is lag in the battle on mobile . I don't know how to fix.

Tips : when you Rank Up your Guild Class  find the boy name Pinoy or Find the Hidden treasure. 

 Example : when you become Rank E , go to kaye house and search the rooms when you woke up.

- You can finish the game if you have time.  Good luck.
